title: Trading NFTs on BlueMove
description: Explore BlueMove, a leading NFT marketplace on Aptos that enables users to create, buy, sell, and trade non-fungible tokens with a seamless user interface and comprehensive creator tools.

tasks.title: Prepare for NFT Trading
tasks.description: Add at least 0.05 APT to your wallet to begin exploring BlueMove

tasks.title: NFT Marketplace Basics
tasks.description: Understand what an NFT marketplace does
tasks.question: What is BlueMove's primary function?
options: A marketplace for creating and trading NFTs
tasks.correctAnswer: A marketplace for creating and trading NFTs

tasks.title: Marketplace Fees
tasks.question: How do NFT marketplaces like BlueMove typically generate revenue?
options: By taking a percentage of sales as transaction fees
tasks.correctAnswer: By taking a percentage of sales as transaction fees

tasks.title: NFT Standards
tasks.question: Which NFT standard is typically used on BlueMove and other Aptos NFT marketplaces?
options: Aptos Token Standard and Digital Asset Standard
tasks.correctAnswer: Aptos Token Standard and Digital Asset Standard

tasks.title: Collection Creation
tasks.question: How are collections typically created on BlueMove?
options: Collections can only be created by BlueMove team members
Users need to submit applications that are manually approved
Any user can create a collection by deploying a Move module
Users can create collections using BlueMove's creator tools without coding
tasks.correctAnswer: Users can create collections using BlueMove's creator tools without coding

tasks.title: Royalty Payments
tasks.question: How are creator royalties typically handled on BlueMove?
options: Creators receive royalties only from primary sales
Creators can set a royalty percentage that's paid on secondary sales
No royalties are possible on Aptos NFTs
Royalties are only paid in BlueMove's native token
tasks.correctAnswer: Creators can set a royalty percentage that's paid on secondary sales

tasks.title: Listing Types
tasks.description: Learn about different ways to sell NFTs
tasks.question: Which selling methods might BlueMove offer?

tasks.title: NFT Storage
tasks.description: Understanding where NFT data is stored
tasks.question: How is NFT metadata typically stored in BlueMove's ecosystem?
options: On decentralized storage networks like IPFS, with references stored on-chain
On the creator's personal cloud storage
tasks.correctAnswer: On decentralized storage networks like IPFS, with references stored on-chain

tasks.title: Marketplace Discovery
tasks.question: What features might BlueMove offer to help users discover NFTs?
options: Recommendation engine, trending collections, categories, and search filters
NFTs can only be found via direct links
tasks.correctAnswer: Recommendation engine, trending collections, categories, and search filters

tasks.title: NFT Types
tasks.question: What types of NFTs might be traded on BlueMove?
options: Art, collectibles, domain names, virtual land, gaming items, and more
tasks.correctAnswer: Art, collectibles, domain names, virtual land, gaming items, and more
